dmca.title: ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, January 30, 2006 12:23 PM
To: Dan.Nicks@bourne-leisure.co.uk; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] cricketwildlifepark.co.uk advertising site.
Date:         Mon, 30 Jan 2006 15:46:06 -0000
From:         Nicks, Dan <Dan.Nicks@bourne-leisure.co.uk>
To:         <abuse@theplanet.com>



This domain seems to be hosted by you.



It is masquerading as our Zoo park Web site, Taking actual Text from our
pages.

As can be see there are Porn links lower down.

Please shut this site down now.



Many Thanks;

/*/Dan Nicks/*//*/.   /*//*/United Kingdom/*/

Tel: (01442) 20-3870

Mobile: (07714) 836-963




______________________________________________________________________
This email has been scanned by the MessageLabs Email Security System.
For more information please visit http://www.messagelabs.com/email
______________________________________________________________________

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html
